pages.text: Any of my current servers, unless stated otherwise, are my private servers. The reason I try to make this known is because it's irritating when people expect them to opperate like public servers.$(br2)My servers were started merely to have fun, then I started to develop my modpack after my friends enjoyed what I had put together at the time. I wanted $(italic)everyone$() to enjoy

playing my modpack, and not just those who play on the servers. I then decided to use my servers as testing servers, because it's hard to test new features in singleplayer alone.$(br2)This is also generally why the servers are laggy; BaerCraft is not developed or intended for servers.
